item.title: Home
item.description: Mechanical Engineer Core competences & skills Design and development of HVAC proposals, Building Information Modelling (BIM), Building Energy Modelling (BEM) & Simulation, Semantic Modelling (vocabularies/ontologies), material quantification & some experience with SAP administrative tools. Personal traits Proactive Adaptable Resourceful Organised Discreet Attention to detail Interested in AECO tech trends Education PhD in Environmental Design and Engineering at the Bartlett, Faculty of Built Environment. University College London (UCL) (Paused/halted).
